boardgame.description: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;The oldest and strongest emotion of mankind is fear, and the oldest and strongest kind of fear is fear of the unknown._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uml;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- H.P. Lovecraft, Supernatural Horror in Literature_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Welcome to the world of the Call of Cthulhu: The Card Game, a world based on the weird fiction of H.P. Lovecraft and his literary circle. In this world, conflicts rage between cosmic powers who want the world for their own unfathomable purposes and the human agencies dedicated to stopping them._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The weird world of H.P. Lovecraft's Cthulhu Mythos has drawn in fans for more than eighty years, with its richly painted themes of suspense, adventure, and the eerie unknown. Call of Cthulhu: The Card Game is fully immersed in this world and what is more, places you, as a player, in control of some of the facets of that world._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A typical game of Call of Cthulhu plays very quickly between two players and it has a high-level of player interaction, analysis of open information, planning and strategy. There is a wide variety of possible combinations of factions (Syndicate with Agency, Cthulhu with Hastur, etc.) and each combination will necessitate a different, challenging approach, providing high levels of re-playability._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One of the major appeals of the Living Card Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;reg; format is that it gives you not only a solid game experience, full of strategy and excitement, but it also allows you to customize your gaming experience to your liking. As you customize your deck from the Call of Cthulhu: The Card Game card pool, you get to build a strategy around your personal play style._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This game was originally a CCG, having been transitioned to Fantasy Flight Games' new Living Card Game (LCG) format. Monthly Asylum Pack expansions to the card pool were eventually supplanted by larger quarterly(-ish) expansion boxes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;FFG ended development and organized play support for the game in 2015. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;That is not dead which can eternal lie, and with strange aeons, even death may die._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

We are a licensed Games Workshop retailer and have a large selection of Warhammer merchandise in stock. If there is something you are looking for, please feel free to contact us directly in the store.

I have a variety of things for sale: CCG Eldritch premium starter-sealed, came with 6 exclusive cards, Deep One rising, On the Lamb, and 4 others I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t remember-$12.00 25 Syndicate tokens-deep red clear acrylic triangles with the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;$_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; etched onto one side. They look like the $ was supposed to be painted but never was. There is tan contact paper over the rest of the piece, you could paint in the $ before removing the contact paper. Each is about 5/8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; or 17 mm tall. -$5.00 and the rare and limited Yithian Deck-played twice, kept in sleeves the whole time, a mint as an open pack can be. The last one on ebay went for $170 so I put this one up for $125.00 Shipping to payed by the buyer, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll get an exact amount from the PO before invoicing. My local games store still has some of the older CCG booster, APs (including the first series), well picked through singles, and starters available. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re after older stuff, I can put you in contact with them. I do have my CCG collection still, 4 of each common _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; uncommon, 3-4 copies of each rare with a few exceptions (less than optimal cards like Cairo Mercenary for instance). I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not actively looking to sell them all, but if someone makes a good offer for the lot......(no individual card sales at this time)

Fantasy Flight Games (FFG CT18) Ancient, nameless horrors dwell in the darkness, writhing in the night sky and under the earth, just beyond our senses. In Call of Cthulhu: The Card Game, players tak the roles of investigators, villians, and unspeakable horrors inspired by the dark mythos of H.P. Lovecraft. Agency detectives , Miskatonic University students and faculty, and the members of the mysterious Syndacite all join the fight against otherworldly beings including Cthluhu, Hastur, Yog-Sothoth, and Shub Niggurath. Call of Cthulhu: The Card Game is 2-player, customizable dueling game in which players command both human and monster factions. As a Living Card Game, hundreds of addtional Cards are available for all seven factions, allowing players to customize the contents of this set, or create thier own original decks. Lovecraft_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s horrors live, in Call of Cthulhu: The Card game!

Fantasy Flight Games - Call of Cthulhu LCG: Core Set Language: English Players: 2 Age: 13+ Duration: 30 to 60 min Weight: 1.170 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: That is not dead which can eternal lie, and with strange aeons even death may die. Something awful lurks at the fringe of human awareness, dead gods that stir in their slumber, other worlds that press in against our own. A struggle over the fates of men is raging, and you are at its heart. Take command of brave but desperate human investigators or the monstrous and depraved servants of the Ancient Ones. The Call of Cthulhu Living Card Game is a brand new incarnation of the Call of Cthulhu CCG, compatible with all previous releases. Start your game experience with the Core Game, featuring several decks that can be combined in near-infinite deck combinations, Cthulhu figurines, and essential game aids for an immersive Call of Cthulhu experience. Expand your collection with monthly Asylum Packs, adding new cards, new strategies, and new horrors. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

This copy of the game has never been played. It comes with the original box, but the plastic box insert has been removed. The box has some corner/edge wear. This game is complete and contains the original 165 cards from the Call of Cthulhu: LCG Core Set. Also includes 6 Domain cards and 10 Story cards from the CCG as a bonus. All of these cards are sleeved with UltraPro penny sleeves and stored in a plastic UltraPro card storage box. Contains the 36 original doubled-sided Wound/Success Tokens. Also includes 36 red glass counters as a bonus. Contains 6 Cthulhu Domain Markers. 3 are the original green markers that come with the Core Set, but the other 3 have been upgraded to the superior ink-washed versions. Contains the original game board and manual. I ship by USPS Priority Mail. You will pay exactly what the post office charges me for shipping - Geekmail me with your address for a quote. If you ask nicely, I may ship internationally too. I accept PayPal only. The Marketplace gives me 3 business days to confirm the order after you place it so, likewise, I expect payment from you within 3 business days of confirmation. Thanks for looking. B)

Brand New in Shrink! LCG Core Set A portion of the earnings from each sale are donated to St. Jude Children_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Research Hospital. Standard Shipping to USA48: $9.00 I will combine shipping to save you money when ordering multiple games. Standard shipping is UPS Ground. Other shipping options are available upon request (Next Day / USPS / FEDEX). Contact for shipping quote. Alaska and Hawaii orders are shipped via USPS. International orders are shipped via USPS First Class (under 4 pounds) or USPS Priority Mail (up to 70 pounds per box). Contact for shipping quote. Orders ship within 1 business day from receipt of payment (5-10 day waiting period on personal checks). Ohio residents will be charged 6.5% sales tax. Thank-you, Mr. B ROCKIN’ B GAMES www.rockinbgames.com mrb.rockinbgames@gmail.com

Ok, this is my Call of Cthulhu LCG Collection for Sale. It includes the cards of: Core Set(2x) Secrets of Arkham (3 cards each), The Order of the Silver Twilight Spawn of Madness, Kingsport Dreams, At the Mountains of Madness, Ancient Horrors (60 cards) Spawn of The Sleeper, The Horror Beneath the Surface, The Antediluvian Dream, The Terror of the Tides (60 cards) Twilight Horror, In Memory of Day, In the Dread of Night, The Search for the Silver Key, Sleep of the Dead, Journey to Unknown Kadath (This cycle is 40 cards each)

Fantasy Flight Games (FFGCT18) Ancient, nameless horrors dwell in the darkness, writhing in the night sky and under the earth, just beyond our senses. In Call of Cthulhu: The Card Game, players tak the roles of investigators, villians, and unspeakable horrors inspired by the dark mythos of H.P. Lovecraft. Agency detectives , Miskatonic University students and faculty, and the members of the mysterious Syndacite all join the fight against otherworldly beings including Cthluhu, Hastur, Yog-Sothoth, and Shub Niggurath. Call of Cthulhu: The Card Game is 2-player, customizable dueling game in which players command both human and monster factions. As a Living Card Game, hundreds of addtional Cards are available for all seven factions, allowing players to customize the contents of this set, or create thier own original decks. Lovecraft_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s horrors live, in Call of Cthulhu: The Card game!

Via the BoardGameGeek “shopping cart” Note: If this is your first purchase on BoardGameGeek, Go to http://boardgamegeek.com/wiki/page/Marketplace_Buyer_Guide for more information. Unless a larger box is specifically requested, shipments by FedEx will be in whatever of the above box sizes best fits the total order with reasonable room for padding (1/2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; margin minimum on all sides, 1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; or more preferred). Shipment by USPS will be in whatever flat rate box best fits the game - keep in mind the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;game size_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; flat rate boxes leave very little width or height for padding for standard size games and are not reccomended on that basis. In either case seller is not responsible for damage during transit. Prices for heavier FedEx shipments than listed above will be costed (increased) accordingly. Short hop FedEx shipment prices significantly lower than the above baseline will be costed (decreased) accordingly. Shipping rates to Alaska or Hawaii will be higher for FedEx.
